description:
Precia Testarossa is Fate`s mother.
She`s a mad scientist/mage whose real daughter Alicia was killed in a dangerous experiment Precia was conducting. Afterwards she created a clone of Alicia and sent it to collect the twelve Jewel Seeds that would let Precia reach a long lost magical city, which in legends had technology to revive the dead.
name: Precia Testarossa
